name: Mythical Maze
description:
MYTHICAL MAZE

GAME OVERVIEW
The main objective of the game is to reach at specific location , without falling from the platform .
Game will start from the front view , player needs to press specific key in order to look at the top view and then by keeping the path in mind he needs to mave the character accordingly.

The work of the game was distributed one will do props , one will do coding , one will do level design and so on .

Theme 
Theme –  Adventure

Core Gameplay Mechanics Brief 
Survival

Targeted Platform
Any platform

The Elevator Pitch
A survival game with adventure

Number of levels 
No of levels = 5

Project Description Brief
The project is a survival game with elements of adventure containing in town on a small island.

CONTROLS
PRESS "W" TO MOVE FRONT
PRESS "S" TO MOVE BACKWORDS
PRESS "A" TO MOVE LEFT 
PRESS "D" TO MOVE RIGHT
PRESS "SPACE" TO JUMP
PRESS "E" TO CHANGE THE PRESPECTIVE FOR TIME-BEING
